headline: 3 Reasons to Sell MKC and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: McCormick trades at $74.11 per share and has stayed right on track with the overall market, losing 5.4% over the last six months while the S&P 500 is down 5.4%. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
